pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ryuki (2002, TV show)$(br)Health: 40

pages.title: Kamen Rider Scissors
pages.text: Special moves:$(li)Uses Advent Cards to gain weapons$(br2)Spawn locations: Cherry Grove, Frozen Peaks, Jagged Peaks, Meadow, Snowy Slopes, Stony Peaks$(br2)Drops$(li)1 $(l:ryuki/items/contract_advent_cards#volcancer_advent)Volcancer Advent Card$(/l)$(li)1-2 $(l:ryuki/arsenal/strike_vent_cards#scissors_pinch_vent)Scissorspinch Strike Vent Cards$(/l) or $(l:ryuki/arsenal/guard_vent_cards#shell_defense_vent)Shelldefense Guard Vent Cards$(/l)
Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ryuki (2002, TV show)$(br)Health: 40

pages.title: Kamen Rider Ryuki
pages.text: Spawn locations: All other biomes/dimensions during day$(br2)Special moves:$(li)Uses Advent Cards to gain weapons$(li)Uses his $(l:ryuki/riders/ryuki#survive)Survive$(/l) form if you have a $(l:ryuki/items/survive_cards#survive_rekka)Survive card$(/l) in your inventory$(br2)Drops$(li)1 $(l:ryuki/items/contract_advent_cards#dragreder_advent)Dragreder Advent Card$(/l)$(li)1-2 $(l:ryuki/arsenal/sword_vent_cards#ride_saber_vent)Ridesaber Sword Vent Cards$(/l), $(l:ryuki/arsenal/sword_vent_cards#drag_saber_vent)Dragsaber Sword Vent Cards$(/l), $(l:ryuki/arsenal/strike_vent_cards#drag_claw_vent)Dragclaw Strike Vent Cards$(/l), or $(l:ryuki/arsenal/guard_vent_cards#drag_shield_vent)Dragshield Guard $(/l) $(l:ryuki/items/other_form_advent_cards#drag_shield_vent_form)Vent Cards$(/l)
Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ryuki (2002, TV show)$(br)Health: 40

pages.title: Kamen Rider Ryuki Survive
pages.text: Special moves:$(li)Uses Advent Cards to gain weapons$(br2)Drops$(li)1-2 $(l:ryuki/arsenal/shoot_vent_cards#drag_visor_zwei_vent)Dragvisorzwei Shoot Vent Cards$(/l), $(l:ryuki/arsenal/sword_vent_cards#drag_blade_vent)Dragblade Sword Vent Cards$(/l), $(l:ryuki/arsenal/guard_vent_cards#fire_wall_vent)Firewall Guard Vent Cards$(/l), $(l:ryuki/arsenal/shoot_vent_cards#meteor_bullet_vent)Meteorbullet Shoot Vent Cards$(/l), or $(l:ryuki/arsenal/trick_vent_cards#ryuki_trick_vent)Ryuki Trick Vent Cards$(/l)
Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ryuki (2002, TV show)$(br)Health: 40

pages.title: Kamen Rider Knight
pages.text: Spawn locations: All other biomes/dimensions during night$(br2)Special moves:$(li)Uses Advent Cards to gain weapons$(li)Uses his $(l:ryuki/riders/knight#survive)Survive$(/l) form if you have a $(l:ryuki/items/survive_cards#survive_rekka)Survive card$(/l) in your inventory$(br2)Drops$(li)1 $(l:ryuki/items/contract_advent_cards#darkwing_advent)Darkwing Advent Card$(/l)$(li)1-2 $(l:ryuki/arsenal/sword_vent_cards#wing_lancer_vent)Winglancer Sword Vent Cards$(/l), $(l:ryuki/arsenal/trick_vent_cards#knight_trick_vent)Trick Vent Cards$(/l), $(l:ryuki/items/other_form_advent_cards#wing_wall_vent)Wingwall Guard Vent Cards$(/l), or $(l:ryuki/arsenal/nasty_vent)Nasty Vent Cards$(/l)
Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Ryuki (2002, TV show)$(br)Health: 40

pages.title: Kamen Rider Knight Survive
pages.text: Special moves:$(li)Uses Advent Cards to gain weapons$(br2)Drops$(li)1-2 $(l:ryuki/arsenal/guard_vent_cards#dark_visor_zwei_vent)Darkvisorzwei Guard Vent Cards$(/l), $(l:ryuki/arsenal/sword_vent_cards#dark_blade_vent)Darkblade Sword Vent Cards$(/l), $(l:ryuki/arsenal/shoot_vent_cards#dark_arrow_vent)Darkarrow Shoot Vent Cards$(/l), or $(l:ryuki/arsenal/blust_vent)Blust Vent Cards$(/l)
